testcase.classname: Navigate to BestBuy E-Gift Cards Page from Menu
testcase.name: Navigate to E-Gift Cards page via menu
testcase.system-out: Given more functionality should be available................................passed When user clicks More.......................................................passed And user clicks Gift Cards..................................................passed Then the Gift Cards page should be displayed................................passed

testcase.classname: Navigate to BestBuy E-Gift Cards Page from Menu
testcase.name: Validate required fields and navigate to design selection
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Gift Cards page....................................passed When the user clicks on E-Gift Cards,E-Gift Card page should be displayed...passed And the user enters recipient name and the user enters sender name........passed And the user clicks on Send a Digital Card.................................passed Then the user should be navigated to the Choose E-Gift Card Design page.....passed
